items.title: Ukraine strikes oil terminal, planes and ships in an array of strikes inside Russia
items.description: Ukrainian forces say they have hit an oil terminal, a pipeline, two parked jet fighters, and two ships in a series of strikes on Russian soil

items.title: WATCH:  Shoplifting suspect pulls gun on officer
items.description: Things took a terrifying turn for police in Canton, Ohio, who were taking alleged shoplifting suspects into custody at a Walmart.

items.title: Trump admin pauses leases for offshore wind projects over national security concerns
items.description: The Trump administration is pausing five offshore wind projects due to national security concerns, Interior Secretary Doug Burgum announced on Monday.
